desc:
A Telegram bot that uses the inline mode to allow people to type "@satoshiquotebot sorry" and return search results for all Satoshi oneliners (in the example above it should return the quote that ends with "If you don't believe me or don't get it, I don't have time to try to convince you, sorry.").

Just that, a simple bot that can be used to easily spam group chats with wisdom from the genius.
head: A Telegram bot for Satoshi quotes
